name: TenShiTheWayHome
description:
Hello everyone , I am  o丶馒头 ，a newbie game programmer. This is my second  game named TenshiTheWayHome. 

In 2021.01 , for learning development horizontal break though type game, I developed a game name TenshiGoHome. Now nearly two years later,for test my ability of programming.  I refact this game with my lastest programming opinion and technology.

This game is talking about Hinanawi Tenshi, who living in Bhavaagra. During a feast, when yukari and Sanae complain that it is tired to climb mountain, tenshi say it is easy for her. So her friends decide to improve the difficulty of her way home for fun.

In this Game, you just control character move and jump. When you get the gem, you can get more abilities such as shot and dash. These abilities will help you across those difficult level.

Though I try my best to refact some parts of levels , its level design is  still terrible.Although it is not a excellent game, I promise this game's elements is complete. It has audio, music ,  normal image, opening of a show and ending of a show. It should pay attention that this game's language is Chinese and it has some dialogs by Chinese.

Last but no least, thank you for playing it and if there are any bugs you can contact me. It's welcome If you have any propose about level design.
